title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.91 - Sodium, metallic dispersion in organic solvent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.91 - Sodium, metallic dispersion in organic solvent

State Regulations

Sodium, metallic dispersion in organic solvent, is
restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of six quarts or 30 pounds gross
weight provided, however, the contents of each outside container is one quart
capacity or less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.91

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
